alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Mason (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 23 at 7:01PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Meigs, central Mason and northern Jackson Counties through 730 PM EDT... At 701 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Point Pleasant, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Point Pleasant, Racine, Forked Run State Park, Ravenswood, New Haven, Sandyville, Syracuse, Henderson, Leon, Portland, Mount Alto, Cottageville and Letart. This includes Interstate 77 in West Virginia between mile markers 141 and 153. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for southeastern Ohio...and western and northwestern West Virginia.
